thread.title: Eagle-eyed The Chase viewers spot embarrassing production glitch - and quickly point it out
thread.title_full: Eagle-eyed The Chase viewers spot embarrassing production glitch - and quickly point it out

author: Nicola Oakley
title: Eagle-eyed The Chase viewers spot embarrassing production glitch - and quickly point it out
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
We Brits love it when something goes wrong in a TV show, and viewers of The Chase took pleasure in pointing one out on last night's show. 
Ray, Simon and Claire were absolutely smashing it, having beaten the Sinnerman (also known as Paul) to win a Â£16,000 prize to share between the three of them. 
But as they celebrated and the camera panned back, some eagle-eyed viewers spotted that something had changed on screen. 
Due to a production glitch, the panel in front of the contestants changed to show completely different names. 
Instead of Ray, Simon and Claire, anyone tuning in would think they were looking at an invisible contestant called Kerry alongside Dan, Cecilia (who's looking quite butch) and Tashi. 
Oh dear... Yep, they're definitely not their names (Photo: ITV) 
It was only fleeting, but viewers - not wanting to let an embarrassing production error go unnoticed - were quick to rewind their Sky+ boxes and snap a photo of it. 
Indeed, the Chase viewers love a bit of drama, and the show is no stranger to an innuendo or two. Read More
